can you write jvzoo style funnel fe, oto1, oto2, oto3, oto4 with downsell at oto1 and recuriing at oto2.

Front End (FE) - Mini Video Marvels

Title: "Mini Video Marvels: Skyrocket Your Sales with Tiny, High-Impact Videos!"

Description: Unleash the power of tiny yet captivating videos to sell millions of products and services. No technical or video skills required! Create eye-catching live action videos for market domination, generate unlimited videos with a 1-click automated video maker, and tap into the largest audience for FREE organic and viral traffic. Get started today with this user-friendly and proven video customer-getting system.

---

One Time Offer 1 (OTO1) - Video Marvels Pro

Title: "Video Marvels Pro: Unlock Unlimited Possibilities & Boost Your Profits!"

Description: Turbocharge your video marketing with Video Marvels Pro! Access premium features like advanced video editing tools, priority customer support, and an extended library of agency templates. Create even more stunning videos to maximize your sales, leads, and engagement.

Downsell: Video Marvels Pro Lite

Title: "Video Marvels Pro Lite: Get Essential Pro Features without Breaking the Bank!"

Description: Don't miss out on the Pro advantage! Get access to essential Pro features like basic video editing tools and an extended library of agency templates. Create better videos and boost your online presence at an affordable price.

---

One Time Offer 2 (OTO2) - Video Marvels Elite Club

Title: "Video Marvels Elite Club: Stay Ahead of the Game with Exclusive Access & Monthly Updates!"

Description: Join the Video Marvels Elite Club and get exclusive access to new agency templates, cutting-edge features, and video marketing strategies every month. Stay ahead of your competition with the latest industry insights and trends.

Recurring: Monthly subscription to the Video Marvels Elite Club.

---

One Time Offer 3 (OTO3) - Video Marvels Agency License

Title: "Video Marvels Agency License: Multiply Your Income by Selling Video Services to Clients!"

Description: Unlock the full potential of your video creation skills with the Video Marvels Agency License. Offer high-quality video services to clients and multiply your income. Get access to a client management dashboard, done-for-you marketing materials, and white-label rights to sell your videos.

---

One Time Offer 4 (OTO4) - Video Marvels Ultimate Traffic Booster

Title: "Video Marvels Ultimate Traffic Booster: Drive Insane Amounts of Traffic to Your Videos!"

Description: Supercharge your video marketing with the Ultimate Traffic Booster! This powerful software will help you drive massive amounts of organic and viral traffic to your videos, ensuring maximum exposure and engagement. Dominate your niche and watch your sales, leads, and conversions soar!
what should be the price of each OTO

The pricing of each OTO can vary depending on the value provided and the target audience. However, here's a suggested price range for each OTO based on similar products in the market:

Front End (FE) - Mini Video Marvels: $27 - $47

One Time Offer 1 (OTO1) - Video Marvels Pro: $67 - $97
Downsell: Video Marvels Pro Lite: $37 - $57

One Time Offer 2 (OTO2) - Video Marvels Elite Club: $27 - $47 per month (recurring)

One Time Offer 3 (OTO3) - Video Marvels Agency License: $197 - $297

One Time Offer 4 (OTO4) - Video Marvels Ultimate Traffic Booster: $47 - $97

Please note that these prices are just suggestions, and you should consider your target audience, product value, and competition when determining the final price points.
can you create bundle offer like jvzoo product style and what should be the price for the same

Title: "Video Marvels Ultimate Bundle: Unleash the Full Power of Video Marketing at a Fraction of the Cost!"

Description: Get the complete Video Marvels experience with our Ultimate Bundle! This all-in-one package includes the Front End (Mini Video Marvels) and all four One Time Offers (OTOs) - Video Marvels Pro, Video Marvels Elite Club, Video Marvels Agency License, and Video Marvels Ultimate Traffic Booster. Unlock the full potential of your video marketing efforts and dominate your niche with this unbeatable offer.

Suggested Price: $297 - $397

This suggested price takes into account the combined value of all the products in the bundle and offers a significant discount compared to purchasing each OTO separately. By offering this bundle at an attractive price, you can encourage customers to take advantage of the complete Video Marvels experience while increasing the overall revenue for your product launch.
what should I do with OTO2 recurring if they buy it through bundle?

If customers purchase the Video Marvels Ultimate Bundle, which includes the OTO2 - Video Marvels Elite Club with recurring monthly subscription, you can offer them a special deal on the recurring payments. There are a few ways you can approach this:

1. Offer a discounted rate for the recurring subscription: If the standalone OTO2 has a recurring fee of $27-$47 per month, you could offer a discounted rate of $17-$37 per month for those who purchase the bundle. This provides an additional incentive for customers to buy the complete package.
2. Include a certain number of months free: Offer customers who purchase the bundle a specific number of months of free access to the Video Marvels Elite Club. For example, you could provide 3 or 6 months of free membership, after which they would be charged the regular monthly rate.
3. Offer a lifetime membership at a one-time fee: Instead of a recurring subscription for the Video Marvels Elite Club, you could provide a lifetime membership for those who purchase the bundle. This would be a one-time fee (already included in the bundle price) that grants customers permanent access to the Elite Club features, without any additional monthly charges.

Remember to clearly state the terms of the deal for the OTO2 recurring subscription when customers purchase the bundle, so they are fully aware of the costs and benefits associated with their purchase.
would be feasible and good business decision?

Option 3, offering a lifetime membership at a one-time fee for those who purchase the bundle, can be a good business decision if you consider a few factors:

1. Attractiveness of the offer: By including a lifetime membership in the bundle, you're providing customers with an attractive incentive to buy the complete package. This can lead to higher sales and increased revenue for your product launch.
2. Customer lifetime value: A lifetime membership can encourage long-term loyalty and engagement from your customers. This means that although they won't be paying recurring fees, they may be more likely to purchase other products or services from you in the future, increasing their overall lifetime value.
3. Cost vs. revenue: Consider the costs associated with offering a lifetime membership (e.g., ongoing content updates, server maintenance, customer support) and weigh them against the potential revenue generated by the increased sales of the bundle. If the bundle's increased sales can offset the costs of providing lifetime access, it can be a viable business decision.
4. Market competition: If your competitors are offering similar products with monthly subscription fees, a lifetime membership can give you a competitive edge and help you stand out in the market.

Keep in mind that it's essential to evaluate your specific business model, target audience, and market competition before deciding if offering a lifetime membership is the best decision for your product.
